Token.Abstract: This class provides methods for doing synching records to/from the server from/to the smartstore.
Singleton method for accessing the sync manager instance for the given user. This instance uses the default store.

Parameter.Name: user
Parameter.Abstract: User to which this manager instance's data is scoped.

Token.Abstract: Singleton method for accessing a sync manager based on a user and store name. This instance uses the store with the given name for the given user.

Parameter.Name: user
Parameter.Abstract: User associated with the store.

Parameter.Name: storeName
Parameter.Abstract: Name of the requested store.

Token.Abstract: Singleton method for accessing a sync manager based on user and store name. This instance uses the store with the given name for the given user.

Parameter.Name: storeName
Parameter.Abstract: Name of the requested store.

Parameter.Name: userAccount
Parameter.Abstract: User associated with the store.

Token.Abstract: Singleton method for accessing sync manager instance by SmartStore store.

Parameter.Name: store
Parameter.Abstract: SmartStore instance whose sync manager is being requested.

Token.Abstract: Remove the shared instance associated with the given user.

Parameter.Name: user
Parameter.Abstract: User associated with the store.

Token.Abstract: Remove the shared instance associated with the given user and store name.

Parameter.Name: user
Parameter.Abstract: User associated with the store.

Parameter.Name: storeName
Parameter.Abstract: Name of the requested store.

Token.Abstract: Remove the shared instance associated with the given store name and user.

Parameter.Name: storeName
Parameter.Abstract: Name of the requested store.

Parameter.Name: userAccount
Parameter.Abstract: User associated with the store.

Token.Abstract: Remove the shared instance associated with the specified store.

Parameter.Name: store
Parameter.Abstract: SmartStore instance whose sync manager is to be removed.

Token.Abstract: Remove all shared instances.
Stop the sync manager. It can take a while for active syncs to actually stop. Call isStopped to see if the sync manager is fully paused.
YES if a stop was requested but some syncs are still active.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if a stop was requested but some syncs are still active.

Token.Abstract: YES if a stop was requested and no syncs are still active.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if a stop was requested and no syncs are still active.

Token.Abstract: Restart this sync manager.

Parameter.Name: restartStoppedSyncs
Parameter.Abstract: Pass YES to restart all stopped syncs.

Parameter.Name: updateBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be called with updates.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Reports any error (optional).

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if restarted successfully.

Token.Abstract: Check whether a sync manager is running.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Reports any error (optional).

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the sync manager is running, or NO if it's stopping or stopped.

Token.Abstract: Return status of the sync with the given sync ID.

Parameter.Name: syncId
Parameter.Abstract: Sync ID.

Token.Abstract: Return status of the sync with the given name.

Parameter.Name: syncName
Parameter.Abstract: Sync name.

Token.Abstract: Return YES if a sync with the given name exists.

Parameter.Name: syncName
Parameter.Abstract: Sync name.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES a sync with the given name exists.

Token.Abstract: Delete the sync with the given ID.

Parameter.Name: syncId
Parameter.Abstract: Sync ID.

Token.Abstract: Delete the sync with the given name.

Parameter.Name: syncName
Parameter.Abstract: Sync name.

Token.Abstract: Create a sync down without running it.

Parameter.Name: target
Parameter.Abstract: Sync down target that will manage the sync down process.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: Options associated with this sync down.

Parameter.Name: soupName
Parameter.Abstract: Soup name where the local entries are stored.

Parameter.Name: syncName
Parameter.Abstract: Name for this sync (optional).

ReturnValue.Abstract: Sync state associated with this sync down.

Token.Abstract: Create and run a sync down that overwrites modified records.

Parameter.Name: target
Parameter.Abstract: Sync down target that will manage the sync down process.

Parameter.Name: soupName
Parameter.Abstract: Soup name where the local entries are stored.

Parameter.Name: updateBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be called with updates.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Sync state associated with this sync, or nil if it could not be created.

Token.Abstract: Create and run a sync down.

Parameter.Name: target
Parameter.Abstract: Sync down target that manages the sync down process.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: Options associated with this sync down. Use this parameter to specify how the sync should handle modified records in the store.

Parameter.Name: soupName
Parameter.Abstract: Soup name where the local entries are stored.

Parameter.Name: updateBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be called with updates.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Sync state associated with this sync, or nil if it could not be created.

Token.Abstract: Create and run a named sync down.

Parameter.Name: target
Parameter.Abstract: Sync down target that will manage the sync down process.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: Options associated with this sync down. Use this parameter to specify how the sync should handle modified records in the store.

Parameter.Name: soupName
Parameter.Abstract: Soup name where the local entries are stored.

Parameter.Name: syncName
Parameter.Abstract: Name for this sync.

Parameter.Name: updateBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be called with updates.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Sync state associated with this sync, or nil if it could not be created.

Token.Abstract: Create and run a named sync down.
Token.Declaration: - (nullable SFSyncState *)syncDownWithTarget:(SFSyncDownTarget *)target options:(SFSyncOptions *)options soupName:(NSString *)soupName syncName:(nullable NSString *)syncName updateBlock:(SFSyncSyncManagerUpdateBlock)updateBlock error:(NSError **)error

Parameter.Name: target
Parameter.Abstract: Sync down target that will manage the sync down process.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: Options associated with this sync down. Use this parameter to specify how the sync should handle modified records in the store.

Parameter.Name: soupName
Parameter.Abstract: Soup name where the local entries are stored.

Parameter.Name: syncName
Parameter.Abstract: Name for this sync.

Parameter.Name: updateBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be called with updates.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Sets error if sync could not be created.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Sync state associated with this sync, or nil if it could not be created.

Token.Abstract: Perform a resync.

Parameter.Name: syncId
Parameter.Abstract: Sync ID.

Parameter.Name: updateBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be called with updates.

Token.Abstract: Perform a resync.

Parameter.Name: syncId
Parameter.Abstract: Sync ID.

Parameter.Name: updateBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be called with updates.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Sets error if sync could not be started.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Sync state associated with this sync, or nil if it could not be started.

Token.Abstract: Perform a resync by name.

Parameter.Name: syncName
Parameter.Abstract: Sync name.

Parameter.Name: updateBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be called with updates.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Sync state associated with this sync, or nil if it could not be started.

Token.Abstract: Perform a resync by name.

Parameter.Name: syncName
Parameter.Abstract: Sync name.

Parameter.Name: updateBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be called with updates.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Sets error if sync could not be started.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Sync state associated with this sync, or nil if it could not be started.

Token.Abstract: Create a sync up without running it.

Parameter.Name: target
Parameter.Abstract: Sync up target that will manage the sync up process.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: Options associated with this sync up. Use this parameter to specify how the sync should handle modified records on the server.

Parameter.Name: soupName
Parameter.Abstract: Soup name where the local entries are stored.

Parameter.Name: syncName
Parameter.Abstract: Name for this sync.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Sync state associated with this sync up.

Token.Abstract: Create and run a sync up with the default SFSyncUpTarget.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: Options associated with this sync up. Use this parameter to specify how the sync should handle modified records on the server.

Parameter.Name: soupName
Parameter.Abstract: Soup name where the local entries are stored.

Parameter.Name: updateBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be called with updates.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Sync state associated with this sync, or nil if it could not be created.

Token.Abstract: Create and run a sync up with the configured SFSyncUpTarget.

Parameter.Name: target
Parameter.Abstract: Sync up target that will manage the sync up process.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: Options associated with this sync up. Use this parameter to specify how the sync should handle modified records on the server.

Parameter.Name: soupName
Parameter.Abstract: Soup name where the local entries are stored.

Parameter.Name: updateBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be called with updates.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Sync state associated with this sync, or nil if it could not be created.

Token.Abstract: Create and run a named sync up.

Parameter.Name: target
Parameter.Abstract: Sync up target that will manage the sync up process.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: Options associated with this sync up. Use this parameter to specify how the sync should handle modified records on the server.

Parameter.Name: soupName
Parameter.Abstract: Soup name where the local entries are stored.

Parameter.Name: syncName
Parameter.Abstract: Name for this sync.

Parameter.Name: updateBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be called with updates.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Sync state associated with this sync, or nil if it could not be created.

Token.Abstract: Create and run a named sync up.
Token.Declaration: - (nullable SFSyncState *)syncUpWithTarget:(SFSyncUpTarget *)target options:(SFSyncOptions *)options soupName:(NSString *)soupName syncName:(nullable NSString *)syncName updateBlock:(SFSyncSyncManagerUpdateBlock)updateBlock error:(NSError **)error

Parameter.Name: target
Parameter.Abstract: Sync up target that will manage the sync up process.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: Options associated with this sync up. Use this parameter to specify how the sync should handle modified records on the server.

Parameter.Name: error

Token.Abstract: Remove local copies of records that have been deleted on the server or do not match the query results on the server anymore.

Parameter.Name: syncId
Parameter.Abstract: Sync ID.

Parameter.Name: completionStatusBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Completion status block.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if cleanResyncGhosts started successfully.

Token.Abstract: Remove local copies of records that have been deleted on the server or do not match the query results on the server anymore.

Parameter.Name: syncId
Parameter.Abstract: Sync ID.

Parameter.Name: completionStatusBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Completion status block.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Sets error if clean operation could not be started.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if cleanResyncGhosts started successfully.

Token.Abstract: Remove local copies of records that have been deleted on the server or do not match the query results on the server anymore.

Parameter.Name: syncName
Parameter.Abstract: Sync Name.

Parameter.Name: completionStatusBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Completion status block.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Sets error if clean operation could not be started.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if cleanResyncGhosts started successfully.
